snippet.title: POPGOES Arcade Premium - Clip #1 - "The Bestiary"
snippet.description:
Wishlist POPGOES Arcade on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986840/POPGOES_Arcade/

When you purchase POPGOES Arcade, either through its ports or its expansion on Steam, you'll gain access to the "premium" version of the game. Not only does this unlock the entirety of POPGOES and the Machinist after attaining 100%, but it also gives you some bonus features for the entire game BEFORE you reach 100%. 

These are kept in the new accomodation in the forest inns. These are basically hotel rooms, and they include something called a Bestiary which logs all of the enemies you fought. The book shows stuff like hidden stats and fun descriptions.

These clips were made for Dawko's WWF Charity Stream: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfC024iDNqg

POPGOES Arcade: https://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/478668

Join my membership to access my Discord server and check out exclusive content: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kanecarter
